name: BreastBodyLocationExtension
title: Breast Body Location Extension
description:
Breast Body Location extension

this extension defines the fields that are used to describe thelocation of an observed item in a breat radiology report

Breast radiology exams have specific ways of defining a location that are unique to this field.

element.definition:
this extension defines the fields that are used to describe thelocation of an observed item in a breat radiology report

Breast radiology exams have specific ways of defining a location that are unique to this field.
